title: Pakistan refugees in J&K get land ownership rights as govt puts them on par with POJK displaced
selftext: J&K govt move would benefit thousands of West Pakistan Refugees (WPRs) who were conferred domicile status following the Centre’s move to scrap Article 370 in August 2019.
